resources.string: 5 is the number of platonic solids.
May 29th is the day in 1954 that First of the annual Bilderberg conferences
1211 is the year that John of England sends a gift of herrings to nunneries in almost every shire despite his status as an excommunicant.
42 is the number of little squares forming the left side trail of Microsoft\'s Windows 98 logo.
